about_the_game:
The Digital Deluxe Content is the perfect expansion for all players of EARTH 2150 and allows deep insights into a fantastic SCI-FI gaming universe.

The EARTH 2150 Digital Deluxe Content includes an Art-Pack loaded with posters, screensavers, renders and wallpapers, the EARTH 2150 sliding puzzle with 14 different themes and the strategy guides and walkthroughs of all three parts of the EARTH 2150 Trilogy. In addition, you can use the developer tools - Earth-C, Moon-C, Interface and Banner creator to design and expand EARTH 2150 with your own ideas.

CONTENT of the DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION

  • ART-PACK consisting of
    • Poster
    • Renders
    • Screensaver
    • Wallpaper
  • DEVELOPER TOOLS:
    • EARTH-C
    • MOON-C
    • Interface Creator
    • Banner Creator
  • Sliding Puzzle with 15 EARTH 2150 Themes
  • Music Video "Escape from the Blue Planet"
  • Strategy Guides, Walkthroughs and Cheats for all three parts of the EARTH Trilogy in English and in German language.

The Digital Deluxe Content is the perfect expansion for all players of EARTH 2150 and allows deep insights into a fantastic SCI-FI gaming universe.

The EARTH 2150 Digital Deluxe Content includes an Art-Pack loaded with posters, screensavers, renders and wallpapers, the EARTH 2150 sliding puzzle with 14 different themes and the strategy guides and walkthroughs of all three parts of the EARTH 2150 Trilogy. In addition, you can use the developer tools - Earth-C, Moon-C, Interface and Banner creator to design and expand EARTH 2150 with your own ideas.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS

name: Earth 2150 - Digital Deluxe Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible @ 64 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
